inputs.name: command
inputs.label: Command
inputs.helpMarkDown:
The NuGet command to run.

Examples: restore, pack

inputs.name: versionSpec
inputs.label: Version specification
inputs.helpMarkDown:
A version or version range that specifies the NuGet version to make available on the path. See the [list of available NuGet versions](http://dist.nuget.org/tools.json).

If you want to match a pre-release version, the specification must contain a major, minor, patch, and pre-release version from the list above.

Examples: 4.x, 3.3.x, 2.8.6, >=4.0.0-0

inputs.name: checkLatest
inputs.label: Always download the latest matching version
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Always check for and download the latest available version of NuGet.exe which satisfies the version spec. This option will also always incur download time and costs, even if the selected version of NuGet is already cached.

Enabling this option could cause unexpected build breaks when a new version of NuGet is released.
